About me

Some Word About me

know me more

I'm Nigar Sultana, a Data Science Engineer

I'm an Engineer & Analyst with a passion for transforming complex data into smart, actionable solutions. I enjoy turning raw information into insights through machine learning, cloud technologies, and data engineering.

My role is to build intelligent, scalable, and efficient systems that help businesses and organizations make better decisions. I focus on creating models, pipelines, and tools that are not only technically strong but also meaningful and easy to use. My goal is to deliver data-driven solutions that solve real-world problems and drive real impact.

Throughout my journey, I have contributed to projects across healthcare, technology, and education — developing advanced AI models, optimizing data pipelines, and delivering powerful analytics that drive smarter decisions. In every role I've taken — whether engineering a system, analyzing trends, or leading innovation — my focus remains the same: To deliver data-driven solutions that solve real-world problems and drive real impact.

05/11 Next Chapter
EXPERIENCES

Highlight My key Experiences

My Experience

(Feb 2025 - Present)

Data Analyst & Program Planner at ECU School of Dental Medicine:

Managed and analyzed clinical data from Axium using SQL and Power BI for strategic planning, state, and federal reporting. Ensured HIPAA-compliant secure data handling and created custom dashboards for performance monitoring.

(Sept 2024 - Jan 2025)

Software Engineer Intern at East Carolina University:

Built an advanced image-to-image translation model using Vision Transformers for breast cancer histopathology. Enhanced model performance by 18% compared to traditional GANs and automated training pipelines on high-performance GPUs.

(Aug 2022 - May 2024)

Research Assistant – Intelligence System in Healthcare at East Carolina University:

Developed centralized and decentralized multi-agent reinforcement learning systems, improving stability by 25%. Integrated Azure cloud solutions for scalable data storage and model deployment with visualization via Neo4j and D3.js.

(Jul 2021 - Jul 2022)

Data Analyst Intern at GyrIT Solutions Pvt Ltd:

Transformed legacy datasets into actionable Power BI dashboards, automating ETL processes and enhancing decision-making efficiency across 50+ stakeholders with a 15% boost in sales insights.

(Jan 2021 - Jun 2021)

Machine Learning Engineer at Amazon Development Center:

Built AWS-based image recognition systems processing over 100,000 warehouse samples. Automated ETL pipelines and improved processing throughput by 75%, optimizing operational data storage and visualization using Power BI.

11/11

EduMaster

Designed and developed a fully functional e-commerce platform for a startup specializing in handcrafted goods. The project involved creating a visually appealing user interface, and ensuring an overall smooth shopping experience.

Project Goals

Developed a website for a non-profit organization aimed at raising awareness and funds for environmental conservation. The site features educational content, event management, and donation capabilities.

  • Create a visually cohesive blog that aligns with the influencer's personal brand.
  • Implement a secure and reliable payment gateway.
  • Ensure the website is responsive and performs well across all devices.
  • Optimize the site for search engines to increase organic traffic.

Client

Mashroom

Category

User Experience

Start Date

02/08/2023

End Date

01/03/2024

Tools

Adobe Xd, Figma

Challenges and Solutions

One of the main challenges was optimizing the website's load time while maintaining high-quality images of the products. To address this, I implemented lazy loading for images and used optimized image formats, resulting in a faster, smoother browsing experience without compromising visual quality.

Key Features:

Developed a website for a non-profit organization aimed at raising awareness and funds for environmental conservation. The site features educational content, event management, and donation capabilities.

  • Custom Blog Layouts: Designed multiple blog layouts to cater to different content types, including image-heavy posts and long-form articles.
  • Content Management System: Integrated WordPress for easy content updates and management, allowing the influencer to focus on creating content without technical hurdles.
  • Responsive Design: Ensured the blog is fully responsive, providing a seamless experience on smartphones, tablets, and desktops.
  • SEO and Social Media Integration: Implemented SEO best practices and integrated social media sharing buttons, making it easy for readers to share posts across platforms.
  • Newsletter Signup: Added a newsletter signup form to help the influencer grow their email list and maintain engagement with followers.
Outcome:

The blog quickly gained traction, attracting a growing audience and enhancing the influencer’s online presence. The user-friendly design and seamless social media integration led to higher engagement rates and increased content sharing.
